Text:
I buy these through the ship-and-save program because they are a staple of my breakfast and midday snack routine.
Light, flavorful, and full of vitamins, these only take 20-25 minutes to bake with minimal extras. I am vegan so I use egg substitutes (3 tbsps flax seed in place of the eggs with 9 Tbs water) and they still bake perfectly.
